roleset.name: ruffle
roleset.note: RIFFLE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from riffle.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: At the end of the room there was a desk heaped [*] with papers , and she-1 began[*-1]to riffle these , [*] making sighs and and noises of girlish exasperation.
example.arg: [*] making sighs and and noises of girlishexasperation
